comment: Telling inappropriate jokes is a great way to find out who s cool and who has a sense of humor . It s also a great way to get people to unfollow you . Hey , you got to cut the fat somehow
amr:
# ::snt Telling inappropriate jokes is a great way to find out who s cool and who has a sense of humor . It s also a great way to get people to unfollow you . Hey , you got to cut the fat somehow
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / way
            :domain (t / tell-01
                  :ARG1 (j / joke-01
                        :ARG1-of (a / appropriate-02
                              :polarity -)))
            :mod (g / great)
            :purpose (f / find-out-03
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (p / person
                              :ARG1-of (c / cool-04))
                        :op2 (p2 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-03
                                    :ARG1 (s / sense-01
                                          :ARG0 p2
                                          :ARG1 (h2 / humor)))))))
      :snt2 (w2 / way
            :mod (g2 / great)
            :domain (g3 / get-04
                  :ARG0 t
                  :ARG1 (o / ollow-01
                        :ARG0 (p3 / person)
                        :ARG1 (y / you)))
            :mod (a3 / also))
      :snt3 g3
      :ARG0 y
      :ARG1 (c2 / cut-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (f2 / fat)
            :manner (s2 / somehow))
      :mod (h3 / hey
            :mode expressive))

comment: Yup . In person , those people are so insufferable and boring . But on here , they are so fun to mess with
amr:

(m / multi-sentence

                              :mod (t / that)))
                  :op2 (b / bore-02

            :degree (s2 / so)
